languages.text: "Мон-кай считают, что служат собратьям по племени — своим мудрым и благородным вожакам. Мой дар достаточно силен, чтобы мон-кай, укрывающиеся в этих лесах, видели людей вместо Детей Азуриана и ваши примитивные постройки вместо следов нашей расы".

traits.locale_text: "А какой у нас был выбор?" {n}Богул сплевывает в сторону.{/n} "Годами терпели фокусы губернаторши. Все ее "улучшения" и "реформы"... только дураки радовались ее подачкам!"

languages.text: "The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай считают, что служат собратьям по племени — своим мудрым и благородным вожакам. Мой дар достаточно силен, чтобы мон-кай, укрывающиеся в этих лесах, видели людей вместо Детей Азуриана и ваши примитивные постройки вместо следов нашей расы".

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

"What choice did we have?" {n}Bogul spits to the side.{/n} "We'd been putting up with the governor's antics for years. With all her 'improvements' and 'reforms'... only morons were happy whenever she threw them a bone, they never noticed what was happening around them. These days, our options are: become a lab Grox or make friends with a xenos Eldar!"

"The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

"What choice did we have?" {n}Bogul spits to the side.{/n} "We'd been putting up with the governor's antics for years. With all her 'improvements' and 'reforms'... only the morons were happy whenever she threw them a bone, they never noticed what was happening around them. These days, our options are: become a lab grox or make friends with an Eldar!"

"What choice did we have?" {n}Bogul spits to the side.{/n} "We'd been putting up with the governor's antics for years. With all her 'improvements' and 'reforms'... only the morons were happy whenever she threw them a bone!"

"The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

"The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

languages.text: “那些猴子坚信他们是在为他们的部落效力，为他们睿智而高贵的酋长效力。我拥有强大的力量，可以让这些躲在森林里的猴子把我们当做人类，而非阿苏焉的子嗣。他们眼中只能看到属于你们的原始身体结构，看不到一丝灵族的踪迹。”
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

traits.locale_text: “那些猴子坚信他们是在为他们的部落效力，为他们睿智而高贵的酋长效力。我拥有强大的力量，可以让这些躲在森林里的猴子把我们当做人类，而非阿苏焉的子嗣。他们眼中只能看到属于你们的原始身体结构，看不到一丝灵族的踪迹。”

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイは同じ部族の仲間の役に立っていると自負しているよ。聡明で高貴な上官のな。私の才は実に優れものでな、この森に潜むモン＝ケイは、アシュリアンの御子らを人間と認識するようになる。同じく、アシュリアンの足跡は原始人の遺構と認識するようになる」
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイは同じ部族の仲間の役に立っていると自負しているよ。聡明で高貴な上官のな。私の才は実に優れものでな、この森に潜むモン＝ケイは、アシュリアンの御子らを人間と認識するようになる。同じく、アシュリアンの足跡は原始人の遺構と認識するようになる」

languages.text: "Die Chem-Pan-Sey glauben, sie dienen anderen Mitgliedern ihres Stammes – ihren weisen und edlen Häuptlingen. Meine Gabe ist stark genug, um dafür zu sorgen, dass die Chem-Pan-Sey, die sich in diesen Wäldern verstecken, uns als Menschen wahrnehmen und nicht als Kinder von Asuryan, und dass sie Eure primitiven Strukturen sehen und nicht die Spuren der Unseren."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

traits.locale_text: "Die Chem-Pan-Sey glauben, sie dienen anderen Mitgliedern ihres Stammes – ihren weisen und edlen Häuptlingen. Meine Gabe ist stark genug, um dafür zu sorgen, dass die Chem-Pan-Sey, die sich in diesen Wäldern verstecken, uns als Menschen wahrnehmen und nicht als Kinder von Asuryan, und dass sie Eure primitiven Strukturen sehen und nicht die Spuren der Unseren."

languages.text: « Ils se croient au service d'autres membres de leur tribu, leurs sages et nobles chefs. Mon don est suffisamment puissant pour nous donner une apparence humaine aux yeux des mon-keigh qui se cachent dans ces forêts. Il en va de même pour les vestiges de notre peuple, qui prennent l'aspect de vos structures primitives. »
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

traits.locale_text: « Ils se croient au service d'autres membres de leur tribu, leurs sages et nobles chefs. Mon don est suffisamment puissant pour nous donner une apparence humaine aux yeux des mon-keigh qui se cachent dans ces forêts. Il en va de même pour les vestiges de notre peuple, qui prennent l'aspect de vos structures primitives. »

languages.text: «Los mon-keigh creen estar sirviendo a otros miembros de su tribu, a sus sabios y nobles jefes. Mi don cuenta con la potencia suficiente como para asegurar que los mon-keigh que se ocultan en estos bosques nos vean como humanos en lugar de hijos de Asuryan, y vuestras estructuras primitivas en lugar de la arquitectura de nuestro pueblo».
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

traits.locale_text: «Los mon-keigh creen estar sirviendo a otros miembros de su tribu, a sus sabios y nobles jefes. Mi don cuenta con la potencia suficiente como para asegurar que los mon-keigh que se ocultan en estos bosques nos vean como humanos en lugar de hijos de Asuryan, y vuestras estructuras primitivas en lugar de la arquitectura de nuestro pueblo».

languages.text: "Mon-keighler, kavimlerinin bilge ve soylu reislerine hizmet ettiklerine inanıyor. Bana bahşedilen güç sayesinde, bu ormanlarda saklanan mon-keighler bizi Asuryan'ın Çocukları olarak değil, insan olarak görüyor. Hakeza türümüzün izlerine bakınca da sizin kendi ilkel yapılarınızı görüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh believe they are serving fellow members of their tribe — their wise and noble chiefs. My gift is potent enough to ensure that the mon-keigh hiding in these forests see us as humans rather than Children of Asuryan, and see your primitive structures rather than the traces of our kind."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler, kavimlerinin bilge ve soylu reislerine hizmet ettiklerine inanıyor. Bana bahşedilen güç sayesinde, bu ormanlarda saklanan mon-keighler bizi Asuryan'ın Çocukları olarak değil, insan olarak görüyor. Hakeza türümüzün izlerine bakınca da sizin kendi ilkel yapılarınızı görüyorlar."
